Hey, I'm Alice

I work with digital products, film, and sometimes clay

At NYU Gallatin I studied the intersection of design, technology, and philosophy;
I still think about the social and cultural ramifications of technology at large

I recently published a short essay on mythology, artifical intelligence, and desire
in CLOG's Artifical Intelligence print issue

And am available for quality creative consulting

I also collect print ephemera, houseplants, and tiny objects

And maintain a ghostlike presence on instagram and twitter

Let's meet in real life!

Live footage of me working from home
to chat/zoom/hangout, you can reach me at caialice @ protonmail.com
